message.body: Ugh look at gwb traffic
ouch, says 40 minutes

#####, she's sick.... Feels very hot, keeps waking up crying but refuses to nurse, only wants to be held and rocked. And the Tylenol and thermometer are packed... I'd have to wake ##### to try to find them and it'd be hard to find the right box. Of all th
sorry. do you know where the Tylenol is?
Umm... Possibly. In a box with the last of the stuff from the medicine cabinet. Somewhere....
I think i might have labeled it. Maybe.
But i also moved so much stuff this evening it's likely buried.
how hot is she? want to make sure the fever isn't super hot
Pretty hot, enough it worries me, I'd like to find the thermometer, it's in the same box anyway. Guess I should go look
ok. let me know
Blah. Found it, Tylenol, but not the baby thermometer. Stupid pink one, which i can't get her to stay still long enough with. It got to 99.3, but she is pissed and wiggly.
Heh, and now she's wide awake and happier and playing. But still pretty hot. :(
hopefully with the Tylenol she'll feel a little better
Yeah, let's hope so. We all need some sleep!
What's her weight since her last appt?
the other time we Gabe it to her she conked out fifteen minutes later
18? don't remember for sure
Guess I'll go with the 18+, since she won't get it all anyway
baby ESP says 17.5 in November
K. All done, that went better than last time. Time to try to get back to sleep...
ETA 3:30
Made it. But I'm in big trouble. They're closed. Til 1/2.for the holiday.
Calling maintenance and hoping they can help us...
Phew. Getting the key now.
